entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023
